nodes.text: Dal Kir was a Force-sensitive male Kel Dor who served as a consular. After the Battle of Yavin, he teamed up with other Force-sensitives, Markus Dorivonn and Kasuni Tamm, in search of a holocron at the Well of Shadows. He and his companions were pursued by Sor Venge, an Inquisitor during their search. Dal Kir wielded a double-bladed lightsaber with blue blades.
Kir appears in the introductory story and gameplay example for Fantasy Flight Games' 2015 roleplaying game book Star Wars: Force and Destiny Core Rulebook.
